titleStmt.title: A caveat to all true Christians against the spreadings of the spirit of Antichrist, and his subtile endeavours to draw men from Jesus Christ / propounded to them by J. Horn, one of the unworthiest of Christs servants in his gospel, a preacher thereof in South Lin, Norfolk ; together with some brief directions for their orderly walkings.
titleStmt.author: Horn, John, 1614-1676.

titleStmt.title: A caveat to all true Christians against the spreadings of the spirit of Antichrist, and his subtile endeavours to draw men from Jesus Christ / propounded to them by J. Horn, one of the unworthiest of Christs servants in his gospel, a preacher thereof in South Lin, Norfolk ; together with some brief directions for their orderly walkings.
titleStmt.author: Horn, John, 1614-1676.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for T. Brewster, and G. Moule, and are to be sold at the three Bibles at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Numerous errors in paging; p. 310 numbered 210.
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Dr. Williams' Library (London, England)
